about_snippet.title: Over 15 Years Serving the Industry
about_snippet.description: PT Inti Logam Persada is your trusted partner in providing precision metal components. Since 2008, we have dedicated ourselves to delivering the best manufacturing solutions.

cta.subtitle: Discuss your needs with our expert team. Get a free consultation and the best offer for your manufacturing project today.

contact_page.header_subtitle: We are ready to help and answer your every question.

about.title: About Us - PT Inti Logam Persada
about.meta: Learn more about the history, vision, and mission of PT Inti Logam Persada in the metal manufacturing industry.
about.history_desc: Founded in 2010, PT Inti Logam Persada started as a small workshop with a big vision to become a leader in the metal manufacturing industry. With dedication to quality and technology adoption, we have transformed into a trusted company serving national and international clients.
about.vision_desc: To become the leading choice for metal manufacturing in Southeast Asia, known for innovation, quality, and reliability.
about.mission_2: Invest in technology and human resources.

services.title: Our Services - PT Inti Logam Persada
services.meta: Explore our metal manufacturing services, including CNC Machining, Fabrication, Welding, and Surface Finishing.
services.cnc_desc: Computerized machining process to create complex components with micron-level accuracy.
services.sheet_desc: Cutting, bending, and assembling sheet metal for various industrial applications.
services.welding_desc: Professional welding services (MIG, TIG) and final assembly for strong and neat construction.
services.finishing_desc: Finishing services such as powder coating, anodizing, and polishing for aesthetics and protection.

profile.desc: PT Inti Logam Persada is a leading metal manufacturing company with a strong commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction.

vision_mission.title: Vision & Mission
vision_mission.meta: Discover our vision and mission as a trusted manufacturing partner.
vision_mission.desc: Our vision is to be the best partner in the metal industry. Our mission is to deliver high-quality products and services through continuous improvement and innovation.

values.title: Company Values
values.meta: Our core values that drive our company culture and service.
values.desc: Integrity, professionalism, innovation, and customer focus are the core values that guide every aspect of our business.

pipe_fittings.desc: We provide durable and precise pipe fittings for industrial, construction, and infrastructure needs.

drainage.desc: Our drainage products are designed for optimal flow and long-lasting performance in various environments.
